content.detailedDescription: At about 9:26 on 12-5-2009 my wife was on our back deck talking on the phone and i was just inside the door from the deck at my computer.Shana suddenly opened the door and said she "needed me outside now",i replied"just a minute",and shana said "now mike".By the tone of her voice i knew she needed me immediately so i joined her quickly. in just a couple of seconds l joined her on the deck.Shana exclaimed "look mike...Look up there!"the sky was clear and our view unobstructed.When i looked up i was shocked to see above us ,moving at what appeared to be a high rate of speed,seven or eight white starlike lights.It was hard to determine the exact number as they were manuevering in and out,back and forth,and around eachother.The movements,while i am by no means an expert,were not possible by conventional aircraft.All of the lights traveled at the exact same speed and in the exact same direction across the sky.The direction of travel was wnw to ese.No sound was evident and they had left our field of view within 30 seconds of my arrival outdoors.I hope this information will be of use.You are welcome to speak to myself or my wife,we would like to be as helpful as possible.Thank you for your time.
content.summary: Grouping of 7 or 8 starlike white lights.

content.detailedDescription: Seen unit flying  towards me at about 300-400 feet and stop right above me and i stoped my truck put window down and it sat above me for approx 4 seconds, no noise at all . no jet wash no prop noise, lights of some sort on bottom approx a row of two twelve to fourteen on bottom. i was a mainline jet mechanic for us-airways, i know what jet wash is and there was no noise at all.
content.summary: A plane twice the size of a herrior jet

content.detailedDescription:
I was near the i-75 and i-475 exchange in cincinnati, oh and it was almost completely dark and i was observing a strange shape in a cloud that i had noticed earlier in the day and was trying to photograph it but it was too dark to get a clear shot. 
i switched to video mode at the end to capture the essence of the enviornment i was in. at the time i could not clearly see the object floating in the foreground however i could tell there was something there. 
it was only after reviewing the short video that i could see the object and by then it was completely dark and i lost sight of it. 
my first impression after seeing the video was that it was a nearly transparent winged object like a dragonfly drone that was completely silent. 
it was the same shape as the hole in the cloud that i had been trying to photograh and it's possible it could have been some type of holographic image being projected from or connected to the cloud.
it's easiest the see the object with the video size in media player set to 50%.
content.summary: Stealth drone

content.detailedDescription: There was a giant super bright star that i thought was a planet until i rounded the corner and it followed. it had on an extremely bright light in front and it was flying really low. i turned the corner again and all of a sudden the back side of it was on the other side of the highaway. there were 2 other lights in the back. one on each side. it didnt make any noise when it passed over and crossed a very large amount of distance in seconds.
content.summary: Huge bright silent flying thing

content.detailedDescription:
i had just left my mother-in-laws home going back to my home when i had driven about a block i came to a stop at a stop sign and something caught my attention. it was raining just a little, more of a sprinkling mist.
at the top of a telephone there were 4 oval objects all different colors. it looked as though they were joind together side to side. the front one looked as though it was feeding off of the transformer. i thought to myself am i going crazy i wiped my eyes and shook my head but they were still there. i felt very scared at that moment not know what or if it could harm me in any way. i reached down for my cell phone hoping to take a picture but i had left it at home. i sat there for about 90 seconds before it started moving away from the transformer. it moved very slow at first and then it went down the line so fast and it was gone. i waited 3 days before i told my wife and to this day i have only told a few people because i can't explain it. i have a degree in criminology and i am no idiot. i would like for someone explain to me what it was i saw. the reason i am writing you is because i can't get it off my mind after all this time.
content.summary: 4 oval shaped objects all different colors hovering at a telephone pole transformer

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from a meeting noticed a orange dot in the sky that didnt look like an airplane. at first i thought it was a rocket but it didnt move like one. its stayed at one level in sky and did not move higher. then as i watched it it changed from orange to a more white color. it was there and when i got off the interstate my view was cut off by some trees and when i looked again it was gone. no strange feelings at all.
content.summary: Orange to white fire ball in south east sky.

content.detailedDescription: I did not use my real name i dont trust nun.I was outside my barracks looking over my barracks when it flies over it for like 3 and halve minutes.It flew from left to right i mean like from one side of my barracks to the other slowly took off.I mean it took off so quick like a beam of light man.Man [cms/tg/pd] what the hell was it?
content.summary: Man it was [cms/tg/pd] red with like 3 white lights under it

content.detailedDescription:
Was out back getting some wood when i noticed some lights overhead moving slowly to the north. i could make out a giant black triangular shape moving through the breaking clouds. im not sure what the speed was but it couldnt have been more than 50-60 mph. it was totally silent and jaw droppingly awesome.

i looked on the internet and there is a website for this thing. its called the stealth blimp. 
http://www.Thestealthblimp.Com/

thank you.
content.summary: Saw the stealth blimp headed north

content.detailedDescription:
i'd been watching out the window and saw an object and thought it was the brightest star in the sky and it was flickering and watched it about an hour and noticed it had dropped and i woke my girlfriend and we both went outside and i started to try to film it but my camera settings were messed up and the date--i hadn't changed the date, but it was showing the night before and i could not turn off live view.  but i got it figured out where i could at least film it 23 minutes until it went behind the mountain--the video is high quality although i need to get a tripod today because it is difficult to hold my arms still. the pictures i snapped are not good.   my girlfriend grabbed the binoculars and also saw it.  the video is 2 gigs and too large to upload.  

this is the second night in a row i saw and filmed this at approximately the same time.  

the photos are not a good quality like the film, but show a very bright object in the sky.
content.summary: Very bright round white object hovered in sky and slowly disappeared behind mountain.

content.detailedDescription:
It was about 9:53 pm and i was on my way in a carpool to my friends house. we were close to a store(giant, namely) and then it came from all the way in front of us and slowly came into view(we were at a red light). it was flying very low for an aircraft(about 2000 feet up). that was the first sighting, and the closest. i saw in detail(though i was wearing my not so powerful glasses) that there 2 cigar shaped bodies, with a bridge? connecting them both. at first, i only saw the 1 red light and 2 green lights emmited from the ufo as it was still on the horizon. it was dark, but there were streetlights. first, i though it was a bunch of junkies with colored lights.
i just did some research and learned that red and green are legal lights, stated in this: http://periheliondesign.Com/downloads/redandgreenledpositionlights.Pdf   . i was with 3 other people including the driver. we all saw it, though the driver was too busy concentrating on the road. the first time i saw it, i realized that i could take a picture with my cellphone. turns out, for some reason, it was broken(there was light, but just a black, empty screen). i have waited all my life for this, looking out the car windows, and the time has finally come. i was too stunned at first to open the window and start pointing. i was searching this whole day for more imformation on this cigar ufo. after the first sighting, the ufo dissapeared. it came into view again just above some trees in the horizon, and it was moving toward us, but i knew i shouldnt tell the driver to stop, and we drove in front of it and i never saw it again... i looked out the car window, stood outside, but stilll not trace. my friends and i were joking about politics and stuff, and i was the first to see it. i first noticed it just by chance, by looking out the window. my friend didnt tak it seriously, claiming that it was a disformed stoplight in the sky. well, i was the only one who took it seriously and tried to look at it the whole time. i did not feel any time laspes, radio interfereence, just my cell phone randomly breaking. the ufo moved in a straight line at a constant speed, and becuase it was pretty close, i dont think it was going that fast, mabye like 80 mph? i saw it in like 20 second intervals. i felt really disappoointed afterwards, since i hate ufo misteries...
content.summary: Cigar shaped ufo, 1 red light, 2 green lights, did not blink, moving relatively slow.

content.detailedDescription:
Decided to go out and take some pictures of the sky and just see what i might get.  uploaded pictures to computer some time later, and when running the slide through spotted this one, white,appears still. the second one is dark, and appears to be moving.  i took no pictures of any visible object flying. these just showed up on the pictures. it was late afternoon around 3pm, the view was northwest from my deck for the white disk, and straight west for the dark object in aurora. november 6, 2009 about 3 pm
i also had a visual sighting sometime back i'd say in march 2009, i was coming home on the rtd train, riding backwards, and my view was to the north, toward boulder, and just sitting there above the plains this side of the mountains was a dark disc shaped object. there were no clouds at that time, it was around 4:30 pm. of course the train was moving and then my view was blocked.
content.summary: White disc sitting up there, did not see it when i took picture, notice on upload.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my back porch smoking a cigarette @ midnite with the lights of sitting in the moonlight. the night sky was clear and i noticed lights in the sky that got my attention. at first i thought it was a jet,but it was moving to fast. i watched the lights moving west to east, it then manauvered left then  went back to the course it was on.

there is no jet that can change course like this object did,it never slowed down. i have watched numerous planes and jets in this same area and it took them alot longer to move than this object, and move as far as this did in the short amount of time it took.

i'm a belever now and never was before. i was so exceted that i made my wife come out and see it. she only waatched it for a few seconds. i have never seen anything like it. it finally flew out of my sight. this all took place within a minutes time and then it flew away.
content.summary: Traveling from west to east, flashing lights, manuevered like no other aircraft. went super fast across the sky!

content.detailedDescription:
Walked outside my house to leave and pick up my wife. i saw an orange light in the sky that was a color i'd never seen in the sky before. it was about the size of venus in the evening winter sky when i first saw it. it was moving zig-zag slowly toward me, south-westerly direction, the zig-zags less than a few degrees in width from my view.

i watched it meander closer and closer for about 3 minutes. as it got closer it was getting larger and based on trajectory and size increase i'd guess it was at 5,000-10,000 feet altitude.

at a certain point it stopped, maybe 5 miles ne of my house (in santa clara, ca); at this time it was about 2-1/2 times the size of venus and about as bright - still a unique orange color.

the single light seemed to become two suddenly then three very small spheres dropped at free-fall speed from the object then slowed falling rate after 1 to 1.5 seconds (1/3rd the distance to the ground). the three spheres were tiny from my perspective and the same color as the object/lights. the spheres appeared to slow and then were not visible. it was slightly foggy so i'm unsure if the spheres went purposefully invisible or simply went out of sight to me.

****

in the last two weeks my wife and i have seen several ufos; myself seeing 4 seperate events in the santa clara area. the first event maybe 2 weeks prior was two lights performing non-typical maneuvers at very high altitude around midnight. the other was a small metalic sphere about 2x the size of venus, in broad daylight.

the main event described here is the only one reported to mufon.
content.summary: Orange light about 3 times the size of venus; 3 small spheres released

content.detailedDescription: While out filming in a big field 4 or more pulsing orbs slowly move into triangle formation and remain there for a few min. my husband was a witness as well. there was a lot of activity and has been here in nj since may. we had our 1st  ( with our entire family while in car )sighting of a black triangle that traveled along side of  us for about 2 mi. while driving on rt. 517 .( no camera ) we have been looking in the skies and filming ever since. we have more to view on you tube mi8kie8865.           here is another triangle formation at a quarry..... http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=zxyqr68up2o&feature=relatedthis is happening all over ....
content.summary: 3 then 4 pulsing orbs form triangle while hovering

content.detailedDescription:
I saw a object on a photo i shot looking at the stars.
the object is moveing very quickly my shutter was only open for 10 seconds.
the stars are in focus,and the object has a path all over the frame.
content.summary: I did not see it untill i looked at my star photos tonight.

content.detailedDescription: I lived 1 mi. from a 5 hanger airport for 16 yrs. i am familiar with aircraft the noise they make , their lights and flight patterns.  this craft flew across the airport silently ,it was a black chevron shape craft. the lights were pulsing , not strobing. it threw a orange cone -vortex shaped light on the ground . then a red on the trees, then white before it flew across the airport into my neighborhood. this did not come from andover airport , we only have had about 6 night flights in since june 09.        i have seen and filmed lots of other crafts recently , within the past few weeks crafts that drop white orbs. hovering crafts  and orbs that skim or fly by .  please view on you tube mikie8865 .
content.summary: Black chevron throws lights on trees and ground.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my way home with my mum (she was driving) from st andrews on friday 27th of november 2009, it was a very clear night. when we were outside windygates heading along the main road to kirkcaldy(a915)at about 7:10 i noticed a very bright light(south east) very low on the horizon in the direction we were heading. i quickly put on my glasses to have a closer look. at first i thought it was the top of a town���s christmas tree due to its position and height but as we were approaching the roundabout we gained higher ground and i could see 2 bright lights in the distance. because of this new vantage point i concluded it was no longer the top of a christmas tree nor was it a star, the only star i could see was very high up just to the left of the moon which i believe to be the north star. as we passed the roundabout and carried onto kirkcaldy i could make out a 3rd light. i noticed that the 3 lights were all different colours and arranged in a triangle, i got very excited and took a few pictures but none of them worked, camera phones are terrible. the object on the left, which was the tip of the triangle in my opinion was a yellow light, the 1 on the bottom right was an orange reddish light and the 1 on the top right was a bright white light. 

none of them pulsed nor did it occur to me this was anything but a squadron of helicopters, even though i did find the colours odd. it wasn���t till i got my phone out to take a picture on my camera that i noticed something strange. i rolled down the window so there wouldn���t be a reflection when i took a photo and there was no noise. if these were helicopters i expected to hear them, then i realised that these 3 lights actually might be connected by a structure, as i started to make out 3 sides connecting the 3 lights like a triangle. it then appeared to turn clockwise. 

my mum and i were so intrigued by this that we pulled into wells green which we had just approached. turns out we weren���t the only ones that found these lights odd as other cars started pulling into the driving ranges car park as well. i took my mums camera out her back, got out the car and headed down the wee road to get a better look. i was about midway down with the driving range exactly on my right and could quite clearly see the 3 lights just above the tree line. i tried to take pictures of the object but the flood lights from the range made it very difficult to get a picture of lights in the distance and i still couldn���t hear anything. so i eventually gave up and got back in the car. we drove on still heading to kirkcaldy. i could still see the 3 lights still emitting the same colours then suddenly the two lights on the right broke off and moved off to the right of my view and disappeared in the distance. i managed to keep an eye one the light left behind.

after about 5 minutes of it being left alone and stationary it started to change colour, it didn���t pulsate, it seemed to fade out of its yellow tinge and fade into green and then red in a seamless way, when it got back to yellow that���s when i knew this was no aircraft that was currently known to me and i had researched many classified and secret craft from the b2 to the supposed aurora craft.

as i stared out the rear passenger side window the object flew with immense speed towards where the other 2 had gone. my head literally turned in about 3 seconds as i followed the object and which also disappeared into the distance. now we were travelling at about 60 miles per hour and this object seemed very, very far away so for it to then pull of at the speed it did and stay at the same distance from us, overtaking us and disappearing into the distance meant this object would have to be going almost supersonic speed something like mach 6 which i know no human could survive nor do we have any aircraft that can go that fast to my knowledge.

i thought that that had been the end of it as we approached kirkcaldy but then i could see the 3 lights had met up and were again in triangle formation the exact way they had been before but now further away in the distance from our location. my mum asked me if i wanted to go down to kirkcaldy promenade/esplanade to take a better look as we drove along dunkier rd, i said yes so we did. we turned off at the roundabout at asda and headed down overton rd to the prom. during this time i could not see the objects however when we arrived and stopped at the truck parking end of the prom i could see the 3 objects over the water (north east), they were slightly higher than before and had split up. yet again the yellow 1 was all by its self but the other 2 had seemed to almost join together side by side and were glowing red and white. they were moving off to the right as i stared out at them, i had to turn to watch them move over land, they were fairly close or at least close enough that i should have been able to hear an engine or rotor, but it was silent. i quickly turned my attention back to the yellow one which by this time had started moving back towards the way it came. i attempted to take pictures but alas my mothers camera is not very good and i got the feeling that even though these lights were bright they were too far away to be picked up so i gave up on trying to snap shots and just focused on visually remembering the events.

i turned to see how the other two on the right were doing and they had vanished. i decided to focus all my attention on the yellow one. it was moving at a steady pace keeping its altitude and suddenly as it moved through the clear black sky 2 stars just appeared out of nowhere 1 over the other and the object passed in-between them and carried on its course. it eventually disappeared in the direction it had came but the 2 stars remained. i ran back to the car, my mum had been on the phone with my dad to inform him of our situation and what we were doing, that was at about 7:30. we left about 7:35.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: 3 lights of different colours in a triangle formation that split up and moved at incredible speeds towards kirkcaldy

content.detailedDescription: Took photo at beamish open air museum in co durham uk. took photo of scenery for momento. nothing unusual was happening and i did not notice anything in the sky. i was showing my grandmother photos of the trip last night and we noticed this uo in the top left corner of the photograph. i am puzzled as to what it could be.
content.summary: Turned up in photograph. didn't realise until last night

content.detailedDescription: Looked out window and noticed an object displaying unusual light patterns watched for several seconds, did not believe to be aircraft, grabbed two different cameras tried to photo,it was being circled by other aircraft which displayed the usual aircraft flashes and strobes,  it changed from different colored lights in a horizontal row to a large glowing white light filmed for several minutes until it dissapeared behind the mountain.
content.summary: First rotating light then bright white light

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were driving a budget rental truck and towing her car because we were moving from phoenix, az back to our hometown of seattle, wa.  we left phoenix around 1pm in the afternoon and arrived in las vegas around 6:30pm and continued to head north via highway 93.  we were about 50-75 miles south of ely and it was around 11pm or so on december 2nd.  both at how middle of nowhere we really were as there were absolutely no lights from buildings and only saw a passing car every twenty to thirty minutes or so.  i remember we were just kind of lightly talking about how much we looked forward to getting to seattle and how few stars we actually could see that particular night because of the full moon that was in the sky that night.  it was during that conversation that we noticed to the ne of us over above the mountain range to the east of us we saw a very bright redish white light that just appeared above the mountain range.  we both saw it and it took a few seconds to register in my head that what we were seeing was not something normal.  i asked her if she saw the light and she responded "what the hell is that."  then the light literally disappeared and immediately reappeared to the right of where it originally was and was visible for a few seconds and then vanished and reappeared a third time in a spot higher above where it was the first two times then disappeared after only being visible for a few seconds.  we both had the exact same reaction, both of our bodies were completely covered in goosebumps and the hairs on the back of our necks were sticking up.  it was probably no more than 10 miles away and it was very obvious that what we saw was either human technology that is far beyond anything we are aware is out there, or something that truly cannot be explained.  it honestly scared the hell out of both of us and we called our parents and they googled what we saw and realized we are not the only ones with a very similar story.  i have never been someone that took anyone's claims of seeing a ufo or anything like that seriously, pretty much always thought they were lying or insane, but after experiencing this and having someone in the car with me seeing it with me has completely changed my attitude on what might be out there.  truly amazing experience i won't forget.
content.summary: Bright red light appeared above mts to east. reappeared three seperate times immediately right after each other in three different spots.

content.detailedDescription: Driving to work it was 430am friday morning i was on the 10 fwy e bound i was coming down kellogg hill i was getting in the first lane as i looked over to cal poly pomona i noticed an orange street light that was out of place it was way to high for a light then i thought if it was off the campus building it should be red for aircrafts could see  first i thought that can't be then i knew what i was looking at it was a ufo it was an orange color large in size looked like it was blendind in to the scene behind it i slowed down to about 50 so i could get a better look it stood very still as i came around to the 57 fwy s it was in the perfect angle it was a ufo just sitting still looked like it was just below the hills behind it and to me it was over cal poly farm ?
content.summary: Traveling on 10fwy east looking at cal poly pomona and a sphere orange in color was sitting in mid air to high to be a street lamp. i slowed to about 50 mph to see what it was as i connected to the 57fwy where i got a clear look

content.detailedDescription:
1.Driving a bus.
2.Lights in sky.
3.An aeroplane.
4.I first noticed two green lights in the sky which must have been a couple or so kilometers distant. the sky was dark and it had been raining recently but visibility was good. the lights were travelling from right to left at first but then the object turned towards the shopping mall where i had stopped to pick up passengers. it flew on a gently descending course until it flew into an area where it was lit up from underneath by lights in the shopping mall carpark when it became apparent that this was no aeroplane. it was somewhat larger than the bus i was driving. it had two green lights on it's left hand side, two red lights on it's right hand side, one of which was flashing, and a very bright white light on the front. it was an isosceles triangle in shape and black in colour. i couldn't make out any structures that may have been on top. i couldn't make out any means of propulsion.  at it's closest it would have been much less than a hundred meters from me. i could hear no sound from it although there was some traffic nearby and the noise of my bus as well. it's speed would have been that of a small aeroplane. there were no visible windows on it. other people must have seen it but i have seen no other reports. i didn't talk to any of the passengers about it. the name of the shopping mall is st. lukes shopping mall and is in the mt. albert area of auckland. i was in morningside drive facing towards mt. albert itself. the triangle flew paralell with morningside drive coming from the direction of blockhouse bay and heading in the direction of grey lynn or western springs. 
5.I feel embarrassed admitting that i've seen this thing. during the sighting i felt surprised. 
6.The object flew past the area of view from my windscreen.
content.summary: Black triangle flyby

content.detailedDescription:
as soon as i had made a left turn onto one of the back roads heading home from work, i immediately noticed two bright lights hovering over my neighborhood in the distance.  it was approximately 1:30 a.M. on november 23, 2009.  the reason these lights caught my attention is because after living in this area for over 30 years i know every shadow, every light, which lights are street lights, and which lights belong to the homes there.  i am very much aware of my surroundings, and i know what belongs and what doesn't.  these lights didn't belong.  

as soon as i noticed these lights, they started moving across toward the east toward the road i was on.  the lights originally started out south west of me.  they were just below the tree line of a wooded ridge situated ahead.  that ridge is approximately 80 to 100 ft. high so this thing was fairly low.  when these lights were directly up ahead of me, i remember thinking this can't be a ufo, and with that thought, all of a sudden a craft appeared above me as if to show me that they were there.  the entire bottom of the thing was lit up, and i could see the original set of lights on the craft, but i don't remember seeing these lights fly toward me.  the nose of the craft was pointed north.  as i stared up at this thing through my windshield in disbelief, i had a feeling that i had seen it before but couldn't remember when or where.   

as it hovered at just above tree top level above me, i continued driving although i did slow down a bit.  i was dividing my attention between the craft and the road, the whole time trying to figure out what it was.  i remember thinking that the shape reminded me of one of our stealth fighter planes, but it could not have been.  first, why would it be flying in our neighborhood that low, and second, i don't think it would have been that well lit up.  i don't remember hearing any sound, and as i made my way to the first street on the right, i noticed that this craft was staying with me.  it was as if it were watching me.  after making my turn, i had to lean forward to get a good view of the craft and noticed that it seemed to be higher up in the sky than before, and it's nose was pointed east.  i didn't see it change direction as i had to divide my attention between this craft and my driving.   a few seconds later the craft disappeared.  i didn't see it leave, and i couldn't see any sign of it in the sky.  no lights.  nothing.

i have searched the internet trying to find something that would at least come close to matching what i saw.  the closest thing i can find is the stealth fighter f-117 nighthawk,  but the similarities are in shape only with still a few differences.  it was triangular, and the back end was curved inward, and i don't remember seeing anything that would indicate tail wings.  i was looking up at it so all i saw was the bottom of the craft.  the two lights i saw originally were situated toward the front end of the craft and were inside a dark oval shape that looked like it was recessed.  there were other details like lines and how they were placed is a little fuzzy in my memory, and for the exception of those lines and that oval shape, the entire bottom was brightly lit. 

i can't recall our military having anything that can hover like that, or disappear the way this thing did, and i would think that it would have been too dangerous for any aircraft to be flying in as low as this one did. 

i have not reported this to the police.  i didn't think they would believe me, but i have told my co-workers and family members.  one of my co-workers told me that she has a neighbor she teases a lot because she claims she sees ufos in this area almost on a daily basis around 5:00 a.M.   so, it seems that our area might possibly be a hot bed for ufo activity, and i've never noticed it before.
content.summary: Triangular shaped aircraft hovered above me for almost 5 minutes.  it was at just above tree top level as far as i can tell.

content.detailedDescription:
First sighting.
i was walking around out side and then i walked twords my moms car i leaned on the hood of the car facing forword and i saw a disc saped object flying over the horrision it went straght south i think and disapeard into the clouds.

second sighting. (i had already repoted this sighting a week or to ago) 
i went to feed the cats and as i was walking i heard a plane over head and i looked up and i saw the plane but next to it was 8 pearl object in a oval formation then they went up then down and turned into 5 objects in a vea formation. i steped back to get a better view and they were gone.
content.summary: 2 ufo sightings first was a disc shaped object flying on the horrision. second was 8-5 pearl shaped objects flying in formations

content.detailedDescription:
At approx 730 pm my wife and i were driving north on i 295 at cumberland area (freeport side of the exit).  i looked to the northeast and observed two large lighted orbs at approx 30 deg above the horizon and 15 deg apart, hovering (not moving).  i pulled over to watch them for about 30 minutes.  they stayed hovering for about ten minutes in a position i esitmate to be somewhere south of brunswick, maine, near freeport.  after about ten minutes, the lights began to move south south east, following the coastline.  this is the same route that i have taken in light aircraft when taking trips to portland and points south (nice daytime views of the coastline).  when the lights moved it was very very slow.  not knowing the distance away i am not able to est. the speed but guessing i would say 20 or so knots if they were over the coastline and not farther out to sea.  i used a pair of field glasses and could multiple white lights making up each of the orbs. ( *  *  * ) they looked like a grouping of three lights.  at no time did they change color or blink, instead just staying at the same intensity.  after 30 minutes they were still "ahead" of us, still not 90 deg off our right side of the car.  i then pulled away northbound and was able to view them for only a couple of minutes more, still traveling south south east along the coast disappearing around yarmouth area.  

i have over 1200 hours in various light aircraft, 80% of it in maine and new england.  if i were asked, these lights did not act as any (known to me) typical aircraft, civilian or military.  there were no strobe lights, no red or green position lights (red on the port or left side and green on the right or starboard side).  there is a naval air station located outside of brunswick, maine, bns, but most if not all of the aircraft stationed there have been transfered due to it's closing next year.  the lights reminded me of three "landing" lights in line.  i was never close enough to be able to tell any shape, just in line ( * * * ).
content.summary: Two large light orbs approx 15deg apart hovering over coastline then moving south along coast.

content.detailedDescription: It began as one light but it split in five, formed a line and flew out of sight.
content.summary: 5 bright white lights flying in unison

content.detailedDescription: Approximately 5:15 p.M. i was helping my boyfriend tow our van back to our house when i happened to glance up in the sky and a very bright rapidly blinking light with no steady blink whatsoever appeared right in front of me.  it happened right at a moment that required intense concentration which made it very frustrating...As i was continuing to pay attention to the job at hand...I glanced again to the sky and another frantically blinking light appears about the same space in the sky where the first one appeared.  the first blinking light was already on the other side of the sky.  i took a deep breath and continued on.  once we got home, i got out of the van and looked up in the sky again and i counted 5 similar blinking lights just appear out of nowhere...They all flew in closer together and made a perfect triangle when another light appeared right beside it...Then the whole formation just dropped in the sky behind a tree line.   i wish i had a video camera to record this and show it to the world.  my boyfriend and i as well as coworkers and friends have all witnessed numerous sightings this past year.  all of them have been reported on this sight.  if anyone else saw anything unusual in the skies tonight in the southern illinois, harrisburg to be exact...Please report what you saw, there is no shame in the truth my friends.
content.summary: Multiple blinking lights appear out of nowhere during time of stress

content.detailedDescription: I was a outside smoking when i looked up and saw a star/light in the sky that was moving extremely irradically.  it seemed maintain a general place in the sky, but was darting in different directions rapidly.  it was doing this quite significantly and in ways that no helecopter could ever do.  the light seemed to be a large distance away so i couldnt see anything but a light.  i called my roomate outside to look, and he saw it's actions and agreed that it was moving significantly and in a way that no normal aircraft would do.  the movement was not slight like a flickering or vicrating or something minor.  this thing would dart and slide across the sky in a way i have never seen before in a plane or helicopter or plane.  hopefully other people saw what i saw at a closer distance or could explain why it was moving the way it was.
content.summary: Light moving in sky in impossible ways

content.detailedDescription: I was driving into work on interstate 40 west from north little rock, ar, towards conway, ar.  i was looking up periodically on the way to work because the moon was still slightly visible and very clear and full.  it was a clear sky with minimal cloud coverage (though some clouds were in the sky).  the full moon was up to my left and while looking back down while driving (yes, not very safe i know, but i wasn't texting), i see this white shape to the right and over of the moon.  i did a double take to see what it was exactly as we have an air force base in little rock and a small airstrip for private planes near by where i was located.  i then could make out the shape clearly.  it was balloon shaped, irradescent white/pearly and like all those other ufo sighting videos you see on youtube or what have you i was thinking to myself...Is this a balloon way up there?!  then i had enough time to actually start checking my facts while still looking from the object and back to the road.  it was a long ways up (at least 15,000 miles or more) and there's no way i would be able to discern a baloon that far up (and can a balloon even get that far up).  and then i thought, well...It's not moving at all.  it was completely stationary.  there was nothing else around it (no objects, no lights, no haze, nothing).  i went a couple of miles just trying to figure out if i should just pull over and still trying to figure out what it could or could not be.  i'm still travelling about 60 mph and then it just vanished.  poof...Gone...No movement, no nothing...Just poof.  i was flabberghasted and just looking around wondering where it went???  i couldn't see it anywhere...The moon was still there...A cloud didn't come in front of the space where it was located.  it just disappeared.  i have no idea what it was and i have a whole new appreciation for all those nutters out there with their video recorders trying to focus in on these things...These things are so high up in the air you would have to have a good camera (like nasa quality) to focus in on it and be able to make it out.  i always thought that they didn't focus in on it to really make it out because then you would be able to tell what it is...Like a balloon.. (and maybe that is still true for some) but in this case, you would have to have something significantly powerful that could focus in on it.  like you would be trying to focus in on a plane that high up and be able to show you some specifics (like how many windows are on it that far up)...So you can see how hard this would be.  unfortunately, as this is my first experience it took me a minute to finally think about pulling over and doing a poor attempt at getting a picture with my cell phone.  so, now photos or anything.  but i am really considering bringing my recorder even though i probably won't be able to get much if it's that far up again.  for sure, this was not a plane or a weather balloon or any of that nonsense.  anyway, my first ufo sighting (i'm 33 and somewhat of a skeptic).  hoping for more now...
content.summary: Luminous white, stationary balloon shaped object at least 15,000 miles up that just disappeared into thin air on a clear early morning sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was on front porch my house on feb.18,2006 at 8:10 pm,i saw a triangle ship across street from me appox.40-45 ft. above ground,size 100 ft.Color black,no windows or opening,speed very slow 15-20 mph-so low only in sight 1-2 min.-sound a low pitch hum.Lights on bottom did not count,8-10 appox.-size were about size of old seal beam car head-light,color amber. the base of triangle in front,the point in rear.Wasso close i could have hit with a sling shot.Direction 60 degree mag.-course would have taken ..Ship over a military base,fort lee ,virginia.What did i think ?Over the years i have seen many lights in the night sky,and were not aircraft ,not of this world. i wrote this down,notes on feb.18,2006   waverly











2\@
content.summary: Size 100 ft. x8-10 ft.,speed 15mph, low pitch hum sound, height 40 ft.
